document.full_text: hundreds of women from a syrian town that has witnessed mass arrests of its men marched along syria's main coastal highway on wednesday to demand their release, human rights activists said.
document.title: women march in syria to demand jailed men be freed
lines_and_colors: hundreds of women from a syrian town that has witnessed mass arrests of its men marched along syria's main coastal highway on wednesday to demand their release, human rights activists said.
